alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 2:17PM EDT until July 22 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 117 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of De Funiak Springs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chipley, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Bradford, Union, Liberty, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Esto, Westville, Noma, Cluster Springs, Whitehead Crossroads, Alpine Heights, Cerrogordo, Gritney, Arrant Settlement, De Funiak Spring Airport, Glendale and Holland Crossroads. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
